Room.Name: Riverdell Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along a relatively quiet stretch of Riverdell Way.
Room.LongDescription: Riverdell Way runs north and south through most of the eastern section of Oceancrest. To the west, you can see a dense forest area that doesn't look inhabitable. To the east, you can see the East Oceancrest City Guard Barracks, where a good portion of the guards are stationed.
